data.text:
@MissLondon199 @GerardDelaney39 The board of directors of the company health insurance companies in Germany reported the massive vaccination damages to the responsible institute PEI and was dismissed yesterday without notice.
https://t.co/pTMKtqQ8ar

@GerardDelaney39 This totally sucks, sorry about your struggles :(. And what also sucks is lack of recognition and answers from professionals. Patronising diagnoses such as anxiety or "functional pain". A let down to say the least

@MissLondon199 I'm so so sorry this happened you. You have no idea how wrong I wanted to be. I suffer with severe chronic pain. So November 2019 I had a flu jab 5 years I took one. 2 weeks after 2019 I was absolutely destroyed. 4 weeks with the worst respiratory viral. I havent been same since

@GerardDelaney39 Well yes. Thats what happened to me. Inflammation all over. Vascular, joint, muscular, cardiac. 
And to think that it didn't even protect against covid is just ridiculous 🙄 https://t.co/Dc8tsmu3Aa
@MissLondon199 Thought it didnt alter DNA 🤔 also read rest of article especially auto immune
